detaileddescription.para: To check out the plugins loaded type openrave --listplugins
To load a simple robot into the scene type: openrave robots/puma.robot.xml
If a plugin declares a ProblemInsance named MyProblem, then to launch the problem at startup type openrave robots/puma.robot.xml -problem MyProblem 'myarguments'
The openrave.py program is similar to openrave, but supports much more functionality. In fact, openrave potentially calls into openrave.py for commands it cannot support.
